home.description: Before starting with your exciting activity, we need to know your medical history to ensure your safety and that of the entire group.
home.step1Desc: Carefully review all the legal terms and conditions of the waiver.
home.step2Desc: Complete the form with your medical history and current health conditions honestly.
home.step3Desc: Provide your digital signature to complete the waiver process and confirm your participation.

terms.termsDesc: Read the following terms carefully before proceeding.
terms.terms1: The undersigned understands that arrangements have been made for a Whitewater Rafting or River Float excursion provided by Rincón Corobicí in Costa Rica. I am fully aware that whitewater rafting involves inherent dangers, including the risk of participants falling from the raft and getting injured. Although these occurrences are rare, the client should research on their own the potential dangers and risks involved in participating in the tour, without this implying or authorizing a refund.
terms.terms2: The undersigned knows and voluntarily assumes the risks of Whitewater Rafting or River Float, claims, causes of action or demands of any kind against Rincón Corobicí and any of its affiliated companies, its employees and officers for any injury, illness, or material loss that may arise from my voluntary participation in this trip. The undersigned knows and voluntarily assumes the risks of Whitewater Rafting or River Float in the surroundings of the Corobicí River, Tenorio River, Sarapiquí River, Aguacate River, or any other Whitewater Rafting or River Float not mentioned here, visited during the tour, for any claim made on their behalf against Rincón Corobicí or any of its affiliated companies.
terms.terms3: Therefore, the undersigned releases, discharges, and agrees to hold harmless Rincón Corobicí and any of its affiliated companies, their representatives, assignees, employees, or any other person, corporation or corporations for whom they may be acting, regardless of how any claim may arise. The undersigned agrees to comply with all rules, regulations, and governmental restrictions during this trip.
terms.terms4: The contracted tour or activity, as well as this waiver, shall be governed exclusively by the laws of Costa Rica. Even despite this contract, if I proceed to file a lawsuit against Rincón Corobicí and any of its affiliated companies, their representatives, assignees, employees, or any other person, I agree not to do so outside Costa Rica's jurisdiction, for which I expressly and voluntarily waive the laws and jurisdiction of any other country.
terms.agreement: I HAVE READ THE ABOVE WAIVER AND RELEASE, BEFORE SIGNING BELOW, AND I GUARANTEE THAT I AM OF LEGAL AGE AND FULLY UNDERSTAND THE CONTENT AND CONSEQUENCES OF THE SAME, INCLUDING THAT I AM WAIVING MY RIGHTS TO FILE A LAWSUIT IF I GET INJURED.
terms.warning: Rincón Corobicí is not responsible for glasses, hearing aids, contact lenses, cameras, dentures, or other valuables.
